title: direct DNS queries and
extract: A name server is a computer that answers questions about domain names, such as IP addresses. These 13 servers act as a kind of telephone switchboard for DNS. They don't know the answer, but they can direct DNS queries to someone that knows where to find it.Aug 9, 2018
extract_html: A name server is a computer that answers questions about domain names, such as IP addresses. These 13 servers act as a kind of telephone switchboard for DNS. They don't know the answer, but they can direct DNS queries to someone that knows where to find it.Aug 9, 2018
